answers.answer: Congratulations... I hope everything goes well and you can bring him home soon!!!
Congratulations!! I'll be praying for your little man Noah. Hopefully you can bring him home soon!!

oh wow so sorry that you had to have him so early, but am very happy for you that he is doing well so far. i pray that he continues to do well and can go home soon. i think that babies have to weigh a minimum of 5 lbs before they are allowed to go home... hope he gains fast.  is he breathing on his own or does he need help?
Thank you ladies. =) He is breathing room oxygen as of today.
OH Fawn he sounds like he is a strong little booger! My Addy will be joining in a couple of days! Congrats honey, I hope he grows stronger everyday, till you get to bring him home! ((HUGS))
Thank you, I bet you can't wait to hold her. =)
he's beautiful!!  Hope all goes well for you both!!
congrats and hopefully lil noah will be able to come home soon!
Congrats and i hope you get to take him home soon!!  I'll keep you both in my thoughts and prayers until then.
Congrats!! hoping he'll be out of the NICU soon. How many weeks were you when you delivered him? Did they induce labor?

question: Hi Ladies,I just wanted to let you all know that I went in to the hospital 4/5/09 and was diagnosed with severe preeclampsia and had Noah on 4/8/09 at 6:01 pm. He weighed 3 lbs. 9 ozs. and is 17 inches long, he is currently in the NICU but is doing very well.
title: Had Noah 4/8/09
